"Controlling Your Character": "This tutorial will instruct you on how to control your character."

"You can control your character's actions as follows:

(When using the keyboard and mouse)
Forward:<%MoveForward>
Backward:<%MoveBack>
Left:<%MoveLeft>
Right:<%MoveRight>

(When using a Gamepad)
Left Analog Stick Control"

"You can control the camera as follows:

(When using the keyboard and mouse)
Move the mouse

(When using a Gamepad)
Right Analog Stick Control"
"You use Photon Arts and Techniques with <%PhotonArts>. If you time a Standard Attack or Photon Art just right, you can unleash a powerful 'Just Attack'."
"You can pick up items by pressing <%Access>. If you hold <%Access> and walk across items, you can pick up many items at once."

"To use the items and skills you set to your Subpalette, simply move your cursor to what you want to use, and hit <%SubPalette>.

Move Cursor Left:<%SubPaletteLeft>
Move Cursor Right:<%SubPaletteRight>
Use:<%SubPalette>"
